item.title: Greenlanders brace for summit that could shape the Arctic's future - and their own
item.description: US Vice President JD Vance will host Danish and Greenlandic foreign ministers for talks on Wednesday.

item.title: Trump vows 'very strong action' if Iran executes protesters
item.description: Relatives of 26-year-old Erfan Soltani, who was detained last week, have told BBC Persian he is due to be executed on Wednesday.

item.title: No power or water and -19C: Kyiv seeks relief from Russian strikes and cold
item.description: Residents of Ukraine's capital talk about their difficulties keeping warm and enduring power outages, as Russian attacks deepen the energy crisis.

item.title: China announces record $1tn trade surplus despite Trump tariffs
item.description: Beijing reported the largest-ever trade surplus at $1.19tn as China diversified its trade.

item.title: K-pop drum duet between Japan and South Korea's leaders caps off summit talks
item.description: Leaders of the two East Asian nations played drums to hits from BTS and KPop Demon Hunters.
